title.rendered: JOB POST: DevOps Engineers Off-Campus Drive by Apple [Freshers 10 LPA]: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Apple Inc. invites applications for a DevOps Engineers Off-Campus Drive, Check the relevant details below!

About Apple

Apple Incorporation is an American technology company founded in April 1976 by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne. Founded in 1977, the company was one of the first manufacturers of personal computers with graphical user interfaces.

Job Description

  • In this role, you will use your DevOps expertise to ensure that production changes do not cause incidents that impact our business.
  • Apply your understanding of security practices to develop standards across the organization to ensure our properties are safe from attackers and the usage of data and analysis of log files to resolve areas to improve.
  • You will define objectives and key results and use metrics to measure your impact.
  • You will work with and influence multiple teams, including development, production support, business teams, and other technical and non-technical teams within Apple.
  • Your goal is to ensure an efficient, reliable process from development to production to allow our business teams to continue to provide the most remarkable customer experience.

Qualifications

  • Expertise in configuration management (such as Ansible, and Salt) for deploying, configuring, and managing servers and systems.
  • Have a passion for automation by creating tools using Python, Java or Bash.
  • Experience deploying and managing CI/CD pipelines.
  • Experience managing applications on any leading cloud platforms eg.
  • AWS Working knowledge of databases and SQL.
  • Strong expertise in solving complex production issues.
  • Expert understanding of Unix/Linux-based operating systems.
  • Excellent problem-solving, critical thinking and communication skills.
  • Should be able to understand complex architectures and be comfortable working with different teams.
  • They should be highly proactive with a keen focus on improving the uptime availability of our critical services.
  • Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment while continuously evaluating emerging technologies.
  • The position requires solid knowledge of secure coding practices and experience with open-source technologies.
  • Monitor production, staging, test and development environments for various applications in an agile and dynamic organisation.
  • Experience in Contact Center application design/deployments will be preferred.

Additional Skills

  • Excellent verbal and documentation skills (Able to communicate with more non-technical business users)
  • Good analytical skills and ability to research and present findings
  • Strong collaboration skills
  • Pro-active and able to work independently
  • Attention to detail

Location

Hyderabad, Telangana.

How to Apply?

Interested candidates can apply through this link.
